title: WA Robot Events Response
description: Schema for the data field when calling 'wa robot events'. Returns recent detected events.

events.description: Recent events ordered by detection time (newest first)

pane_filter.description: If set, events were filtered to this pane_id

type_filter.description: If set, events were filtered to this event_type

unhandled_only.description: If true, only unhandled events were returned

event.description: A detected event from pattern matching

pane_id.description: Pane where the event was detected

agent_type.description: Type of agent detected in the pane

extracted.description: Values extracted from the matched pattern (e.g., percentage, token counts)

matched_text.description: The text that matched the pattern (may be redacted)

detected_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the event was detected

handled_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the event was handled (null if unhandled)

handled_by_workflow_id.description: ID of the workflow execution that handled this event

suggested_action.description: Recommended action for this event type
